title: Task Automation
description: Gulpify allows you to automate a variety of tasks such as Pug compilation, HTML minification, and much more.
benefit: Saves time and reduces manual work

title: Ease of Use
description: Gulpify provides a simple and intuitive interface for setting up and running tasks, making it accessible for developers of all levels.

title: Extensibility
description: Gulpify is easily extendable with a wide range of plugins, allowing you to tailor it to the specific needs of your project.
